name: Biomedical Research at the Cutting Edge
description: Explore the thought processes, logic, motivation, techniques, analysis and impact of recent high-profile publications to gain insight into the enterprise of science. Outstanding scientists present recent high-impact papers, and students will examine the research in depth, focusing on the underlying questions, experimental approach, results and significance. Restricted to first-year students. Not available for CR/NCR option.
prerequisites: SBI4U and SCH4U (Grade 12 University Preparation Biology and Chemistry); permission of Department
